item.title: About
item.description: I am Aditya Vikram Singh. I am a Physics Student at IIT Kharagpur. You can reach me at various social sites. Github Facebook Twitter Telegram <== text me here Instagram You can also email me at xypnox @ gmail . com (Be smart and remove those spaces ;))
